SELECT c.RES_NUMBER, c.RES_RECEIPT, c.FK_MEMBER_IDX, c.FK_ROOM_IDX, c.FK_COUPON_CODE, c.RES_PAYMENT, c.RESSTATUS_IN_DAY, c.RESSTATUS_OUT_DAY, c.RES_TOTALPRICE, c.RES_POINT, a.hotel_name, b.room_name, b.room_checkintime, b.room_checkouttime FROM tbl_here_hotelInfo a , tbl_here_roomInfo b , TBL_HERE_RESERVATION c WHERE a.HOTEL_IDX = b.FK_HOTEL_IDX AND c.FK_ROOM_IDX = b.ROOM_IDX AND RES_NUMBER = #{res_number}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_HERE_FINISH ( SEQ , FK_RES_NUMBER , FINISH_ADDPOINT , FINISH_PAYMENTSTATUS ) VALUES ( seq_here_finish.nextval , #{res_number} , #{finish_addpoint} , #{res_paymentstatus} )

INSERT INTO TBL_HERE_RESERVATION ( RES_NUMBER, RES_RECEIPT, FK_ROOM_IDX, RESSTATUS_IN_DAY, RESSTATUS_OUT_DAY, RES_TOTALPRICE, RES_POINT, RES_PAYMENTSTATUS, HOTEL_IDX ) values ( #{res_number}, #{res_receipt}, #{room_idx}, #{resstatus_in_day} , #{resstatus_out_day}, #{res_totalprice}, #{res_point}, #{res_paymentstatus}, #{hotel_idx} )
mapper.select: select hotel_idx, hotel_name , room_idx, room_name , room_checkintime , room_checkouttime , roomprice_seqno , roomprice from tbl_here_hotelInfo A join tbl_here_roomInfo B on a.hotel_idx = b.fk_hotel_idx join ( select fk_room_idx, sum(roomprice) as roomprice from tbl_here_roomPrice where roomprice_date >= to_date(#{startday},'yyyy-mm-dd') and roomprice_date < to_date(#{endday},'yyyy-mm-dd') group by fk_room_idx ) c on b.room_idx = c.fk_room_idx join ( select fk_room_idx, roomprice_seqno from tbl_here_roomPrice where roomprice_date >= to_date(#{startday},'yyyy-mm-dd') and roomprice_date < to_date(#{endday},'yyyy-mm-dd') ) d on c.fk_room_idx = d.fk_room_idx where room_idx = #{room_idx}
